common.loginRequired: Please login first to use this feature

layout.title: PixivFlow WebUI
layout.notLoggedInDesc: You are not logged in. Some features may require login to use.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.tokenRefreshedButVerifyFailed: Token refreshed but status verification failed. Please refresh the page.

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Login to PixivFlow
login.loginModeHeadlessDesc: Auto login with username and password, browser runs in background
login.loginModeInteractiveDesc: Open browser window for manual login (Recommended, more stable)
login.processingDesc: Using gppt for Pixiv OAuth authentication (headless mode), this may take some time. On first use of headless mode, the app may automatically install the gppt library (may take a few minutes), please be patient.
login.processingInteractiveDesc: Opening browser window, please complete login in the browser. Interactive mode uses Puppeteer and requires no additional dependencies.
login.requirementsDesc: Recommended to use Interactive Mode (Puppeteer) for login - more stable and requires no additional dependencies. Headless mode uses Python gppt library, which will be automatically installed on first use (may take a few minutes).
login.browserWindowNote: Note: Interactive mode will open a separate browser window where you need to manually complete the login. This method is more stable and recommended.
login.note: After successful login, the refresh_token will be saved to the config file, and you won't need to login again.

config.title: Configuration Management
config.configBatchImportedFailed: Batch import failed, {{count}} configuration files could not be imported
config.logLevelTooltip: Control the verbosity of log output, debug is most detailed, error only shows errors
config.initialDelayTooltip: Delay before download starts to avoid requests being too fast
config.deleteConfigFileConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration file?
config.jsonFormatError: JSON format error, please check syntax
config.jsonEditorWarning: Warning: Directly editing JSON may cause configuration errors, please proceed with caution
config.jsonEditorExternalChangesDesc: The configuration file has been modified by an external program. Click refresh to load the latest content, or continue editing the current content.
config.configFilesEmptyDesc: Configuration files will appear here. You can import configurations to create new files.
config.historyEmptyDesc: Configuration history will appear here after importing or saving configurations
config.deleteHistoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration history?
config.pixivCredentialsHidden: Sensitive information is hidden. To modify, please use command line tools or edit the config file directly.
config.storageIllustrationOrganizationTooltip: Choose how files are organized in the download directory. Options marked with ⭐ organize by download date, making it easier to find files by download time.
config.storageNovelOrganizationTooltip: Choose how files are organized in the download directory. Options marked with ⭐ organize by download date, making it easier to find files by download time.
config.targetsEmpty: No download targets, please click "Add Target" button to add
config.deleteTargetConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this download target?
config.targetsDescription: Configure content to download. Supports tag search, rankings, series download and more. You can add multiple targets, they will execute in order.
config.noTargets: No download targets, please click "Add Target" button to add
config.templateTooltip: Use templates to quickly create common configurations
config.templateDescription: Select a config template to get started quickly, or go directly to the next step to configure manually
config.typeTooltip: Select the type of content to download
config.modeTooltip: Search mode: search works by tags; Ranking mode: download ranking works
config.limitTooltip: Maximum number of works to download per run, recommended: 10-50
config.tagTooltip: Search tags, supports multiple tags separated by spaces (AND relationship). e.g.: 'Genshin' or 'Arknights アークナイツ'
config.tagPlaceholder: e.g.: Genshin or Arknights アークナイツ (multiple tags separated by spaces)
config.searchTargetTooltip: Partial match: tags partially match; Exact match: tags must match exactly; Title and description: search in title and description
config.sortTooltip: Date desc: newest works first; Date asc: oldest works first; Popular desc: most bookmarks first
config.rankingModeTooltip: Select the type of ranking to download
config.rankingDateTooltip: Specify ranking date, format: YYYY-MM-DD or use YESTERDAY for yesterday
config.rankingDatePlaceholder: e.g.: 2024-01-15 or YESTERDAY (leave empty for today)
config.filterTagTooltip: Optional: filter works containing this tag from ranking results
config.filterTagPlaceholder: Optional: e.g. Genshin (leave empty for no filter)
config.minBookmarksTooltip: Only download works with bookmarks greater than or equal to this value, for filtering high-quality works
config.startDateTooltip: Only download works published after this date, format: YYYY-MM-DD
config.endDateTooltip: Only download works published before this date, format: YYYY-MM-DD
config.targetTypeTooltip: Select the type of content to download
config.targetModeTooltip: Search mode: search works by tags; Ranking mode: download ranking works
config.targetLimitTooltip: Maximum number of works to download per run, recommended: 10-50
config.targetTagTooltip: Search tags, supports multiple tags separated by spaces (AND relationship). e.g.: 'Genshin' or 'Arknights アークナイツ'
config.targetTagRequired: Tag cannot be empty in search mode
config.targetTagPlaceholder: e.g.: Genshin or Arknights アークナイツ (multiple tags separated by spaces)
config.templateSelectDescription: Select a configuration template to get started quickly, or proceed to the next step to configure manually
config.targetDeletedButSaveFailed: Download target deleted from form, but failed to save to backend. Please save manually.
config.targetSavedButSaveFailed: Download target added to form, but failed to save to backend. Please save manually.
config.configNotLoaded: Config data not loaded, please try again later
config.configFormatError: Config file format error, please ensure it is a valid JSON file
config.configImportedToForm: Config imported to form, but save failed. Please check the config and save manually.
config.tagRequired: Tag cannot be empty in search mode
config.templateTagSearchDesc: Search and download illustrations by tag
config.templateHighQualityDesc: Filter high-quality works by bookmark count

download.title: Download Task Management
download.description: Here you can start, stop and monitor download tasks. Supports downloading a single target or all configured targets.
download.hasActiveTask: There is a task currently running
download.hasActiveTaskDesc: Please wait for the current task to complete or manually stop it before starting a new task
download.pathTip: Tip: Paths will automatically refresh after config updates, you can also click the refresh button to update manually
download.incompleteTasksDesc: These tasks may not have completed due to network issues or other reasons. You can click the "Resume Download" button to retry downloading
download.confirmDeleteAllDesc: Are you sure you want to delete all {{count}} incomplete tasks? This action cannot be undone.
download.confirmDeleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete incomplete task "{{tag}}" ({{type}})?
download.startDownloadTipDesc: Select a specific target to download, or leave empty to download all configured targets
download.selectConfigFilesTooltip: Select one or more configuration files to use for download. If multiple files are selected, their targets will be merged.
download.selectConfigFilesExtra: If no files are selected, the current active configuration will be used
download.selectTargetTooltip: Leave empty to download all configured targets
download.selectTargetExtra: Select a target from the configured target list to download, or leave empty to download all targets
download.selectTargetPlaceholder: Select target to download (leave empty to download all targets)
download.noTargetsFoundDesc: Please add download targets in the config page first
download.deleteAllFailed: Failed to delete all incomplete tasks
download.error401: Authentication failed: Please check if refresh token is valid, try logging in again
download.error403: Access denied: May be Pixiv API limit, wait and retry
download.errorTimeout: Request timeout: Check network connection or increase timeout
download.errorRetries: Multiple retries failed: Check network connection and proxy settings, wait and retry

logs.title: Log Viewer
logs.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all logs?

files.title: File Browser
files.name: Name
files.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
files.previewNotSupported: This file type is not supported for preview
files.normalizeDescription: This feature will reorganize file structure, normalize file names, and update database records according to current configuration. It is recommended to use preview mode first to see what operations will be performed.
files.normalizeNames: Normalize file names (clean special characters, unify format)
files.reorganize: Reorganize file structure (according to current organization mode)
files.previewModeDesc: This is a preview result, files have not been actually modified. To execute normalization, please click the Execute Normalization button.
files.previewCompleted: Preview completed, please check the result

errorCodes.CONFIG_VALIDATION_TARGETS_REQUIRED: At least one download target is required
errorCodes.CONFIG_VALIDATION_TARGET_LIMIT_INVALID: Target {{index}}: limit must be greater than 0
errorCodes.CONFIG_VALIDATION_CRON_REQUIRED: Cron expression is required when scheduler is enabled
errorCodes.DOWNLOAD_TASK_ALREADY_RUNNING: Another download task is already running
errorCodes.DOWNLOAD_INCOMPLETE_DELETE_ALL_FAILED: Failed to delete all incomplete tasks
errorCodes.DOWNLOAD_INCOMPLETE_TASK_ID_INVALID: Task ID must be a valid positive integer, got: {{rawId}}
errorCodes.DOWNLOAD_RESUME_TARGET_NOT_FOUND: Target not found for tag "{{tag}}" and type "{{type}}"
errorCodes.FILE_IS_DIRECTORY: Path is a directory, not a file
